Install Debian 9

☕️

Install shadowsocks-libev

    sh -c 'printf "deb http://deb.debian.org/debian stretch-backports main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/stretch-backports.list'
    apt update

    apt -t stretch-backports install shadowsocks-libev

Use shadowsocks-libev

    systemctl status shadowsocks-libev
    systemctl start shadowsocks-libev
    systemctl stop shadowsocks-libev
    systemctl restart shadowsocks-libev

or

    service shadowsocks-libev status
    service shadowsocks-libev start
    service shadowsocks-libev stop
    service shadowsocks-libev restart

or

    ss-server -c /etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json

Config of shadowsocks-libev

    vi /etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json
    {
        "server":["0.0.0.0"],
        "mode":"tcp_and_udp",
        "server_port":443,
        "local_port":1080,
        "password":"",
        "timeout":60,
        "method":"chacha20-ietf-poly1305"
    }

  • Tip

    改完记得重启服务

Client

  • os x → ShadowsocksX-NG
  • android → shadowsocks+simple-obfs

如果加了混淆，配置如下

    plugin:obfs-local;
    plugin-opt:obfs=tls;obfs-host:amazon.com

Enable Google BBR

这就是使用Debian 9的原因，不用换内核

    echo "net.core.default_qdisc=fq" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
    echo "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=bbr" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
    sysctl -p

执行下面三条指令，出现bbr说明启用了

    sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control
    sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control
    lsmod | grep bbr

Config of TCP

    // config.txt
    net.core.default_qdisc = fq
    net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control = bbr
    net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen = 3
    
    fs.file-max = 1024000
    net.core.rmem_max = 67108864
    net.core.wmem_max = 67108864
    net.core.rmem_default = 65536
    net.core.wmem_default = 65536
    net.core.netdev_max_backlog = 4096
    net.core.somaxconn = 4096
    net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1
    net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1
    net.ipv4.tcp_tw_recycle = 0
    net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout = 30
    net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time = 1200
    net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range = 10000 65000
    net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 4096
    net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets = 5000
    net.ipv4.tcp_rmem = 4096 87380 67108864
    net.ipv4.tcp_wmem = 4096 65536 67108864
    net.ipv4.tcp_mtu_probing = 1
    net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1

    cat config.txt >> /etc/sysctl.conf
    sysctl -p

Install simple-obfs

    apt -t stretch-backports install simple-obfs

    vi /etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json

添加两个字段

    {
        "plugin": "obfs-server",
        "plugin_opts": "obfs=tls;failover:127.0.0.1:80"
    }

重启ss服务

Install nginx

    apt install nginx

    systemctl status nginx

nginx默认监听80端口

浏览器访问:443将自动跳转至nginx首页
